alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Randolph (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 2:20PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Randolph and east central Lawrence Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 219 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over College City, or over Walnut Ridge, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pocahontas... Walnut Ridge... Hoxie... Black Rock... Reyno... College City... Portia... Biggers... O`Kean... Whiskerville... Giles Spur... Shannon... Dicus... Fender... Elnora... Manson... Lesterville... This includes US Highway 67 between mile markers 118 and 121. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
